title: Love on Top
resume: Five single women and five single men, living in a luxurious mansion, seek for love. They are willing to do anything to conquer the Top Girl or the Top Boy. Every day, they will be evaluated by the Top Girl and the Top Boy, who at the end of every week select two men and two women for eviction.
